comment: Mash as usual 152 for 60mins.  after 60 cool the mash to 120 degrees pitch 10oz unmilled 2 row base malt.  Flush container with co2 and place plastic wrap on surface of mash.  Check once a day for 48 hours.  Taste once it is where desired skim pellicale and sparge as usual boil for 15-30mins. cool then pitch a packet of sa05
